settings.d_details: “Amala Earth bases itself on the promise to be true and to do our best to offer authenticity to the consumer. We aspire to build the trust of our fellow consumers as a reliable and authentic brand. Ethical practices strengthen the authenticity of our mission.”

“We believe in inspiring and introducing our partners to choose responsibly, whether they are involved in producing, packaging or buying consumer products. We encourage informed choices, ensuring a positive impact on the environment.”

"Buying local supports communities at ground level. This is our way of connecting to our Indian heritage and reducing our carbon footprint. The world, today, demands that we look closely at our consumer behavioural patterns across all boards."

"Our selection parameters allow us to identify entrepreneurs that are dedicated to delivering quality and building trust whilst moving towards a more earth-friendly approach. We support and guide sellers to work towards a more transparent and trustworthy process in terms of their product and packaging."

"Amala Earth supports and promotes local farmers, artisans, craftsmen and other community clusters who produce handcrafted, handwoven and handmade products. By supporting community-driven and sustainable practices, we all become responsible for the health of our community and the environment."

settings.content: At Amala Earth, our ethos is to be conscious and supportive of the welfare of the community as well as the environment. We curate products, materials and packaging that are already moving towards or aspiring to be more earth-friendly. We hope to build a platform of like-minded individuals driven by these values and make responsible choices in their lifestyle.

settings.d_details: “Amala Earth’s single-most purpose of being is to encourage healthy and conscious living by creating an inclusive platform of people who are keen to start the journey of transformation or those who are consciously in tune with nature.”

"We, at Amala Earth, are mindful of whom we partner with. Based on a definitive set of parameters, our team carefully chooses the brands that make this one-stop curated marketplace an enriching experience."

AMALA is derived from the Sanskrit word amal which means ‘clean and pure’.

At the core of everything that we do, our aim is to build a community that inspires responsible, earth-friendly choices. By creating expert content that educates people, this community, by example, will be the voice of a conscious way of living in kindness and compassion.

settings.text: Use this text to share information about your brand with your customers. Describe a product, share announcements, or welcome customers to your store.

settings.title: Do I have to create an account to make a purchase?
settings.answer: While it's not necessary to have an account to shop with us, it can make for a quicker and easier checkout process.

settings.title: I have forgotten my password, what do I do?
settings.answer: If you've forgotten your password, don't worry! Just click on the "Recover Password" link when you're logging into your account. We'll send you a link to change your password on your registered email address.

settings.title: What shipping carriers do you use?
settings.answer: We use all major carriers, and local courier partners. You’ll be asked to select a delivery method during checkout.

settings.title: Do you deliver pan-India?
settings.answer: We currently deliver across India to all metros and major non-metro cities. We have tied up with reliable logistics partners that ensure safe delivery. We try our best to ensure there are no delays in shipment, but in certain cases it may be beyond our control.

settings.title: What are the general shipping timelines?
settings.answer: • The preparation timelines for each product are mentioned on the website.• Our logistics partners are notified once the vendor is ready to dispatch your product.• The product is then picked up from the seller and dispatched to the customer location.• The standard timeline for delivery post pick-up is 3-4 days.• Our operations are live across all days (except Sundays and National Holidays).• For any delivery-related issues, you can email us on help@amalaearth.com and we will revert to you within 24 hrs.

settings.title: How is the shipping cost decided?
settings.answer: Shipping charges for your order will be calculated and displayed at checkout. The shipping cost is based on the total order value, so it varies accordingly. For more details, please see our Shipping Policy.

settings.title: How do I track my order?
settings.answer: After you have placed your order, we will send you an email for order confirmation. You can track your placed order via the link provided in the same email.

settings.title: Can I cancel a product that I just ordered?
settings.answer: You can cancel your order at any time within 24 hours of placing the order by reaching out to the customer care service at +91 8800703122 or write to us at help@amalaearth.com. For more details, please see our Cancellation Policy.

settings.title: What are made-to-order products?
settings.answer: Each piece made by some of our vendors (third party) takes a considerable amount of time and effort, hence your product is made only after they have received your order. Your order will be dispatched within 10- 12 days from the date of your order confirmation.

settings.title: I want to return my product. What is Amala Earth’s return policy?
settings.answer:
The products qualify for returns only if:

  • The product(s) delivered does not match the user’s order; or
  • The size of the product is different; or
  • The product(s) have already expired or are about to expire (in less than 3 months); or
  • The product(s) delivered were damaged.

The user shall ensure that the product to be returned remains unused. The tags and the packaging of the product are also to be kept intact and untampered by the User.

The products that do not qualify for return are:

  • The products that have been altered or used; or
  • The products whose serial number or barcode has been tampered with; or
  • If the batch number of the product does not match as mentioned in the invoice; or
  • Products of home décor or any larger items (any item which is larger than 1 metre in any one dimension, or weighs more than 10 Kilograms).

settings.title: There was an issue with my payment. What should I do?
settings.answer: Please write to us at help@amalaearth.com with any Payment Related Issue that you may have or contact us on +91 8800703122. We’d be more than happy to answer any questions.

settings.title: Do you accept all forms of payment?
settings.answer:
We accept the following forms of payment:

  • UPI
  • Visa
  • Mastercard
  • Net banking
  • Rupay
  • Cash on Delivery

settings.title: Is there cash on delivery (COD) available?
settings.answer: A COD charge of INR 35 for orders below INR 500 shall be applicable to all orders that are selected for the COD payment mode. COD is not available for orders exceeding the net amount of INR 5,000. Any order above INR 5,000 will have to be prepaid.

settings.contact_info_text: If we still haven't answered your question, you can contact us below and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
settings.contact_1_text:
+91 8800703122

Timings: 09:00 AM to 11:00 PM, Monday to Sunday.

settings.title: Community-led
settings.text:
Amala Earth supports and promotes local farmers, artisans, craftsmen and other community clusters. It is in these communities that we can quantify the promise of our brands and the success of their efforts.
Be it supporting artisan-led communities, improving the marginalised societies, or empowering its sections through tangible support work, through this parameter, we gauge whether the brands are uniquely bringing value in the communities they operate in.

settings.title: Diversity in teams
settings.text:
The people behind the brand are important to us as it is the first step to building a more inclusive community. Our selection parameters allow us to identify women-led brands and other entrepreneurs dedicated to including women in the workforce.
There are many reasons for this - high competency levels, diversified perspectives and, most importantly, being on the positive side of change. This is our way of kickstarting a more progressive chain reaction in society.

settings.title: Small-batch production
settings.text:
Whether a product is handmade in small batches or uses upcycled materials, the production model is an essential parameter by which we classify and onboard brands. Why? It is good for the environment.
These products do not require a factory or large production facility. Instead, nearly all are made in small studios and workshops or people’s own homes with a lot of love and attention to detail. This makes them unique, earth-friendly and with a story to tell!

settings.title: Locally sourced
settings.text:
Buying homegrown and locally sourced products means there is minimal transportation involved and thus, a reduced environmental impact. Also, supporting local artisans and traditional crafts results in keeping the skill alive.
The brands that are passionate about this reveal that they care for the community just as much as the environment. Introducing this as a parameter is our way of connecting to our Indian heritage and reducing the carbon footprint.

settings.title: Natural materials
settings.text:
Amala Earth bases itself on the promise to be true and to do our best to offer authenticity to the consumer. And it is of utmost importance to us that the materials and ingredients that the brands use are earth-friendly, sustainable and natural.
This way, the products are less resource-intensive, more durable and non-toxic. By keeping this parameter, we aim to encourage informed choices, ensuring a positive impact on the environment.

settings.title: Wellness-oriented
settings.text:
Wellness is now beginning to have a measurable impact on the world. Today, demands for concern-based products that enhance well-being and stay true to their claims are only increasing.
The brands that have products catering to special concerns are given preference through this parameter with a promise that they can be trusted to be good for you.

settings.title: Biodegradable packaging
settings.text:
We support and identify brands that have a more transparent packaging process. Adopting biodegradable packaging shows that the brand strives to reduce their harmful impact on the environment.
By ensuring sustainable practices through this parameter, we all become responsible for the health of our community and the environment.

settings.title: Certified & Licensed
settings.text:
We are committed to giving you a platform that is reliable and authentic. Therefore, we encourage our brand partners to get the right certifications and licences for their products.
This selection parameter allows us to identify brands that are dedicated to delivering quality products while building trust with our customers and community.

settings.subtitle: Amala Earth
settings.title: parameters
settings.text: Amala Earth has developed a mechanism through which each brand gets a score out of 8 based on the following parameters. The system is designed to provide a holistic view of each brand. It helps consumers make informed decisions about what they buy and use.

settings.content: Amala Earth is a way of conscious living built on a foundation rooted deeply in Indian origin. It is a one-stop curated marketplace for healthy, natural and earth-friendly products.

settings.subtitle: Mala Barua
settings.title: Author of Guiltfree Vegan Cookbook
settings.content: Environmental and ethical concerns are some of the biggest reasons to consider vegan food. Even if you include regular food in your diet, there’s no reason you can’t mix-and-match. There’s room for it all on the plate!

settings.subtitle: Mrinalika Bhanjdeo
settings.title: Certified Hatha & Yin Yoga Teacher
settings.content: Found myself some amazing fitness and athleisure wear brands on Amala Earth. Versatile, comfortable, easy for movement and exercising. The fabric feels super soft and breathable on the skin. Has made working out in the summer quite breezy!

settings.subtitle: Alisha
settings.title: Grey Murmurs
settings.content: To keep our immunity levels high and avoid breathing problems, we can turn to simple wellness rituals such as breathing exercises, opting for fresh, healthy foods, taking supplements, including amla in our diet, drinking herbal teas and, switching to soy wax candles which do not have the harmful toxins paraffin wax candles do and keep our homes dust free with regular cleaning.

settings.subtitle: Mitali Jakatdar
settings.title: A zero waste mom
settings.content: Parenting in 2022 has been all about reinventing playing with wooden toys. And we absolutely loved ours from Amala Earth. We come from the Konkan region in Maharashtra. And did you know? Wooden toys first originated there! Wooden toys are earth-friendly, enhance early education, encourage creative play and even last longer. Let’s start making the world a better place for our kids, one wooden toy at a time

settings.subtitle: Jia Singh
settings.title: Conscious Brand Consultant & Content Creator
settings.content: Workout clothes are not only breathable and comfortable but they are also chic, modern and flattering. Organic cotton and bamboo as materials support both functional and design needs. In fact, these fabrics make it soft and versatile for all-day comfort, even when it’s muggy and humid!

settings.subtitle: Shweta
settings.title: Sustainably Milii
settings.content: Hemp’s benefits are countless and yet not enough people are aware of its earth-friendly properties. But with more and more sustainable labels making it to the forefront of the Indian fashion industry and individuals across the country actively giving up fast fashion, there’s no better time to explore the benefits of hemp fibre.

settings.subtitle: Navdeep Kaur
settings.title: Founder & Design Director - Aagghhoo (Kids & Baby brand)
settings.content: We aim to create a world that is gender neutral, 100% natural, honest, functionally superior and empathetic. Aagghhoo is a safe space for parents who are looking for the best products for their babies. For us, it is the comfort and health of all the babies that matters the most.

settings.subtitle: Krati & Varun
settings.title: Founders - Boondh (Fragrance brand)
settings.content: Our fragrances are made using traditional art forms like the deg-phapka technique, handmade paper making and screen-printing.

settings.subtitle: Sharmila Langore Patil
settings.title: sincerestoryteller, Aesthete and Lifestyle Blogger
settings.content: You can create your own beautiful table decor with the special curation of beautiful platters, candles, planters and so much more from Amala Earth and play the perfect hosts whether it’s during the festive celebrations or otherwise. They have something for everyone. And guess what, it’s all earth-friendly.

settings.subtitle: Karuna Ezara Parikh
settings.title: author and fashion influencer
settings.content: I've been watching Amala Earth spread its wings, and it's such a joy to see a tasteful homegrown website featuring products that all have one thing in common - they keep the planet in mind. Pure cottons, khadis, plant based fibres and natural dyes - the assortment is delicious and perfectly light for the Indian summer that is so heavily upon us now.

settings.subtitle: Divya
settings.title: a mom of three well-travelled rescue dogs
settings.content: I was happy to discover local and organic brands curated for pets by Amala Earth. We have two senior dogs and adding drops of CBD oil in their diet helps not only their skin but also their joints. The trio loves gluten-free immunity treats and the hemp balm for their paws.

settings.review_content: I started using it on a recommendation from a friend and i must say it changed my skin. I can see a glow coming from within, highly recommend it.

settings.review_heading: Exceptional and thoughtful for a gift
settings.review_content: Loved the experience and since it was a first time thing …I was kind of worried but turned out amazing. It’s a must try ❤️

settings.review_heading: Love that there is a sustainable harness option
settings.review_content: Absolutely love the harness. Make sure you measure properly and refer to the size guide to make sure that the fit is correct.
Heavy & beautiful sauce pan . Loved it. Same as in pic 📸

1. Made of cotton, which is a natural fabric and keeps the body cool.
2. Highly absorbent of sweat and discharge. Can wear regularly and also while working out. It doesn’t feel sticky or hot.
3. Easy to wash.

Amazing packing with very fast delivery with great price 
so happy with my order on amala earth.. the whole truth chocolates are the best in taste and health and i got the best price here. i dont know why there are negative feedback on google even their customer support was great contacting them was very easy :)
loved these beautiful coffee mug set. gorgeous glazing work and good craftmanship.
